explains: adj. 圆形的，环形的；循环的，绕圈的；循环论证的；传阅的
n. （同时送达多人的）印刷品，宣传单
wordGroup: circular motion 圆周运动；圆运动
circular knitting 圆编；圆筒形针织
circular knitting machine 针织大圆机；圆形针织机；圆编织机
circular dichroism 圆二色性，圆形二色性；循环二色性
circular gear 圆形齿轮，圆柱齿轮
circular cross section 圆形截面；圆截面
circular movement 圆周运动；旋转运动
circular shape 圆形；环形轧材

sentences.en: The island was originally circular in shape.
Loving a child is a circular business.
sentences.cn: 爱一个孩子是一件循环的事情。

sentences.en: He pointed out that the shape of sunspots weren't circular.
sentences.cn: 他指出，太阳黑子不是圆形的。
